title: Bought riot points and didn't receive my rp.
body: So today since the new project skins came out I decided I wanted to get my hands on them so I went to the store and bought a 35 dollar rp bundle. After this I got stuck on the loading screen of buying it for about 20 mins and previous rp purchases took seconds so I that I decided to cancel it and try again. Without knowing this I had accidentally purchased two 35 rp bundles now adding up to 70. And yet again it was stuck on the loading screen forever and didn't load through. In the end my credit card was charged with the two purchases but my account was never rewarded any rp. Its been 6 hours now and nothings happening to my rp balance. I'm hoping that there's anyone who can help me out cause I would like to get my money back or at least receive my rp I purchased. Help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body:
Between the service incident that occurred shortly after 9:00pm PDT and the store getting hit hard with all the transactions due to the new content, RP purchases were acting a bit wonky. If you're still not seeing the RP credited to your account, I recommend reaching out to our billing team via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our specialists will be able to investigate and work with you to resolve this much more efficiently there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you for response, I have sent in the support ticket.
